pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Aligning with the Customer’s Needs</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">You are at your meeting with Rachel Dawson at Sunnyside Psychiatry. After establishing rapport, you reviewed the agenda for the meeting. Now it is time to kick off your discussion with a question. Which question will you ask Rachel first?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. From previous discussions with you, I know that Sunnydale Psychiatry wants to increase the efficiency of the office. What strategies do you plan to use to reach that goal?
B. When you consider all the changes you want to see take place at Sunnydale Psychiatry, what obstacles do you anticipate facing?
C. I’m very pleased we’re talking. Who else in the office is involved in the efficiency initiative, or are you spearheading it?

D. From our previous conversations, I understand that improving the efficiency of your office will be a key to success as the practice grows. What metric will you use to track your progress toward that goal?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Further Aligning with the Customer’s Needs</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">What do you ask Rachel at this point?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. What concerns do you have about increasing the number of patients you see, without also increasing the staff?
B. You’ve spoken before about how patient satisfaction will be a driver of the growth for Sunnydale Psychiatry. How do you see the focus on efficiency impacting your patient satisfaction goals?
C. As you drive these changes within the practice, how will you determine what areas you should focus on first?
D. From our previous conversations, I also understand that increasing patient satisfaction is a priority for the practice. What is your timeline for assessing patient satisfaction?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Beginning to Identify Areas of Value Creation</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">What do you ask Rachel next?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. What strategies will you use to understand, and communicate to the prescribers, the insurance coverage of individual patients?
B. Operationally, what changes do you think you may need to make within your practice as you begin seeing more patients?
C. From your perspective, what role do the non-clinical staff have in impacting patient satisfaction?
D. Do you have any structures in place that may restrict your ability to make the changes you’ve described?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Exploring Areas of Value Creation</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Rachel to move the conversation forward?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. What other options do you see for simultaneously increasing patient satisfaction and the efficiency of your office?
B. Ensuring that you achieve high levels of patient satisfaction can be very hard. What challenges do you foresee?

C. Making such a sweeping change, such as the one about transitioning responsibility for insurance tracking, may lead to resistance. What barriers do you face in achieving the results you’re working toward?
D. Who could I talk to in your office about educational events your practice may want to consider attending?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Context for the Solution</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">What do you ask Rachel at this point?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. If you are successful in making all the changes you described, what other options do you think it may provide to Sunnydale Psychiatry?
B. You’ve talked about a number of changes, some of which will take time to fully implement. What is your timeline for having all the changes fully in place?
C. It sounds like you have clearly defined goals around patient satisfaction and efficiency. How have your goals in these areas changed from last year?
D. What challenges do you anticipate in meeting the options you’ve described, such as shorter wait times and more structured processes?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Context for the Solution</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which follow-up question do you ask Rachel?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. What have you considered for your front office staff, so they would be better prepared to address and overcome the roadblocks you described?
B. What options do you see for minimizing the interruptions that the doctors face when trying to meet with patients?

C. You mentioned earlier that the responsibility for understanding insurance plan coverage and formulary changes was shifting to the non-prescribing Rachel’s office staff. What difficulties, if any, do you think will come out of that change?
D. What steps do you think the office needs to take to reduce the time spent handling administrative details, such as pushing through prior-authorizations?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Rachel now to move the conversation to the next stage?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. I’ll leave behind information on the insurance coverage for my product. Would that be helpful to you and your staff?
B. What are your overall goals around efficiency?
C. As the representative of one of the products regularly prescribed in this office, what can I do to help get your staff up-to-speed on the coverage information for my product?
D. Have you considered ways of using patient education to help reduce call backs and improve the efficiency of your practice?

pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; width:738px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Rachel – Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps</Introtext>
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Rachel next?</welcomeText >

choice.choiceText: A. With the changes in responsibility for insurance administration, I’d like to schedule an appointment within the next few weeks. What time would be best for me to come back?

B. It’s clear that you believe a more efficient practice will lead to greater patient satisfaction, as well as contribute to growth. What are the specific patient satisfaction goals you’re driving toward?
C. What are your thoughts on how pharma representatives can best work with practices such as Sunnydale Psychiatry?
D. What factors are most important to you, when one of the prescribers in the practice begins prescribing a new product?
